title: Estimate value of definite integral from table

content.question: The table above gives selected values for a continuous function f. If f is increasing over the closed interval [ 0,3], which of the following could be the value of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>âˆ«</mo> <mn>0</mn> <mn>3</mn> </msubsup> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F91@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
